locations.name: Quito
locations.description: The world's first UNESCO World Heritage site, known for its colonial architecture set against an Andean backdrop. The tour commences here, implying overnight stays to explore the city.

locations.name: Otavalo
locations.description: Home to one of South America’s most famous indigenous markets. While not explicitly stated as overnight, the description 'immerse yourselves' suggests more than a brief day trip, making an overnight stay highly probable, especially following Quito and before heading to the Amazon.

locations.name: Ecuadorian Amazon Rainforest
locations.description: The tour culminates here with descriptions of spending days exploring trails and experiencing evenings, clearly indicating multiple overnight stays in a jungle lodge setting within the Amazon basin.
